column2: hike under the shade of trees
column3: recommended when hot and sunnychildren would like,very good traced and good maintenance.for families and young baby caddybabby

Really enjoyed the tour. Beautiful park. Fun to see all the interesting houses and furniture and decoration.Trees and flowers magnificent.Lovely tea and scones afterward.Very nice staff. Accommodating to an elderly person who was unable to walk on the tour, but enjoyed sitting in the patio among the wonderful trees.
